original_title: Brendan O'Carroll: How's Your Jolly Roger?
overview: Recorded Live at the Everyman Palace Theatre, Cork  In the "Real" Capital of Ireland, Cork City, Brendan O'Carroll takes the Southern Audience on a riotous trip through Irish life.  Also featuring the debut performance on DVD of Brendan's most loved character "Rocky Brennan"
title: Brendan O'Carroll: How's Your Jolly Roger?
